#labels issues
Issues are the reports from either the public or a staff member about an issue in the city.

Issues will contain the following fields:
  * Created by: the person who put the issue into the application
  * Category: the type of problem being reported
  * Issue Type: Such as complaints, staff report, etc
  * Reported By: the person who is reporting the issue
  * Contacted Via: The way the person reporting the issue contacted the city (email, in person, phone, etc)
  * Comments:details about the issue
  * Respond via: The way the person reporting the issue would like to be contacted
  * Attachments

The Issue section also contains the issue's [History] and [Responses]

== Future Improvements ==
Some categories will be able to &nbsp;add additional fields to be filled out for an issue or offer pre-fabricated comments to choose from. You'll see these when you choose a category.
